messages.subject: Discussion Groups
messages.msgSnippet: Just to let you know that I have added a jump menu to the home page of my site http://www.swordfittings.com which should provide easy access to all of the main
messages.messageBody:
Just to let you know that I have added a jump menu to the home page
of my site http://www.swordfittings.com which should provide easy
access to all of the main nihon-to discussion groups.
I hope you find it useful. Please let me know if you would like me
to add any other groups.

Thanks

Chris Godfrey
